original: tatsvabhāvaiṣiyārhāya tu tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam eva dadāti na yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ na yāvad amūḍhavinayam* /
analyzed: tad svabhāva aiṣiya arhāya tu tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam eva dadāti na yadbhūyaiṣīyam na yāvat a mūḍha vinayam
yat bhūya eṣīya arhāya tarjanīyam karma kurvanti
nigarhaṇīya arhāya pūrvavat yāvat tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam dadāti

original: yadbhūyaiṣīyārhāya yadbhūyaiṣīyam eva dadāti na tarjanīyaṃ na yāvat tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam* /
analyzed: yat bhūya eṣīya arhāya yat bhūya eṣīyam eva dadāti na tarjanīyam na yāvat tatsvabhāvaiṣīyam

original: tarjanīyakarmārhāya nigarhaṇīyaṃ karma kurvanti pratisaṃharaṇīyaṃ pūrvavad yāvad yadbhūyaiṣīyaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: tarjanīya karma arhāya nigarhaṇīyam karma kurvanti pratisaṃharaṇīyam pūrvavat yāvat yadbhūyaiṣīyam dadāti

original: tarjanīyakarmārhāya tu tarjanīyam eva karma kurvanti na pariśiṣṭānīti /
analyzed: tarjanīya karma arhāya tu tarjanīyam eva karma kurvanti na pariśiṣṭāni iti

original: anayā vartanyā cakrapeyālaḥ pūrvavad yāvad dharmakarma /
analyzed: anayā vartanyā cakrapeyālaḥ pūrvavat yāvat dharma karma
nigarhaṇīya karma arhāya tu nigarhaṇīya karma eva kurvanti
pravāsanīya karma arhāya pratisaṃharaṇīyam karma kurvanti

original: pravāsanīyakarmārhāya tu pravāsanīyam eva karma kurvanti /
analyzed: pravāsanīya karma arhāya tu pravāsanīyam eva karma kurvanti
pratisaṃharaṇīya karma arhāya adarśanīya utkṣepaṇīyam karma kurvanti

original: pratisaṃharaṇīyakarmārhāya tu pratisaṃharaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti /
analyzed: pratisaṃharaṇīya karma arhāya tu pratisaṃharaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti
a darśanīya utkṣepaṇīya karma arhāya a pratikarma arhāya utkṣepaṇīyam karma kurvanti

original: adarśanīyotkṣepaṇīyakarmārhāya tv adarśanīyotkṣepaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti /
analyzed: adarśanīya utkṣepaṇīya karma arhāya tu adarśanīya utkṣepaṇīyam eva karma kurvanti
a pratikarma arhāya utkṣepaṇīya karma arhāya parivāsam dadāti

original: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karma kurvanti /
analyzed: a pratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭi gate utkṣepaṇīyam karma kurvanti

original: apratikarmārhāyotkṣepaṇīyakarmārhāya tv apratikarmārhāyotkṣepaṇīyam eva karma (288r1 = GBM 6.888) kurvanti /
analyzed: a pratikarma arhāya utkṣepaṇīya karma arhāya tu  a pratikarma arha SDM utkṣepaṇīyam eva  karma   /  /  /

original: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīykarmārhāya parivāsaṃ dadāti /
analyzed: a pratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭi gate utkṣepaṇīy karma arhāya parivāsam dadāti

original: apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīykarmārhāya tv apratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭigate utkṣepaṇīyaṃ karmaiva kurvanti /
analyzed: a pratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭi gate utkṣepaṇīy karma arhāya tu a pratinisṛṣṭe pāpake dṛṣṭi gate utkṣepaṇīyam karma eva kurvanti
parivāsa karma arhāya mūla parivāsam dadāti

original: parivāsakarmārhāya tv aparivāsam eva tu dadāti /
analyzed: parivāsa karma arhāya tu a parivāsam eva tu dadāti
mūla parivāsa arhāya mūla parivāsam dadāti
mūla parivāsa arhāya tu mūla parivāsam eva dadāti

original: āvarhaṇārhāya tv āvarhaṇam eva kurvanti na saṃmukhavinayaṃ dadāti na yāvan mānāpyam* /
analyzed: āvarhaṇa arhāya tu āvarhaṇam eva kurvanti na saṃmukha vinayam dadāti na yāvat mānāpyam

original: evam eva navakena cakrapeyālaṃ vistareṇa boddhavyam* /
analyzed: evam eva navakena cakrapeyālam vistareṇa boddhavyam
vyagraḥ samagrāḥ rohanti dharma adharmeṇa vā utkṣipet

original: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā bhavanti /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ sīmā prāptāḥ kriyā prāptāḥ te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ chanda arhebhyaḥ ca chandena ānītāḥ bhavanti

original: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ prativahanti pratikrośanti /
analyzed: samavahitāḥ ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ prativahanti pratikrośanti

original: yāvanto bhikṣavaḥ sīmāprāptāḥ kriyāprāptās te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś chandārhebhyaś ca cchandenānītā bhavanti /
analyzed: yāvantaḥ bhikṣavaḥ sīmā prāptāḥ kriyā prāptāḥ te sarve samavahitāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ chanda arhebhyaḥ ca chandena ānītāḥ bhavanti

original: samavahitāś ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā na prativahanti na pratikrośanti /
analyzed: samavahitāḥ ca bhikṣavaḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ na prativahanti na pratikrośanti

original: alajjinaḥ sāntarasya bālasya mūḍhasyāvyaktasyākuśalasya bahiḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathe cyutasya vācā asaṃvṛtasya /
analyzed: alajjinaḥ sāntarasya bālasya mūḍhasya avyaktasya akuśalasya bahis sīmāyām sthitasya īryāpathe cyutasya vācā asaṃvṛtasya

original: prakṛtisthitasya antaḥsīmāyāṃ sthitasya īryāpathād acyutasya vā vācā saṃyatasyeti /
analyzed: prakṛti sthitasya antar sīmāyām sthitasya īryāpathāt acyutasya vā vācā saṃyatasya iti
tatra eka SNNe osāraṇa karman SNNe  /
